name: Liquid Magnetic Liner
about: What it is:A high-performance liquid magnetic liner that combines a long-lasting powerful grip on Glamnetic Magnetic Lashes..Benefits:Long-wearing, Waterproof.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Glamnetic’s Liquid Magnetic Liner offers the bold, highly pigmented definition of your favorite liquid liner while powerfully gripping your Glamnetic Magnetic Lashes. Waterproof, smudge-proof, and sweat-resistant, this high-performance formula holds lashes in place and remains color true, all day.
ingredients: Water (Aqua), Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Citrate, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, [+/- (May Contain/Puet Contenir): Iron Oxide (Cl774990].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Make sure natural lashes are clean and dry..-Starting from the inner corner of your eye working outwards, glide Magnetic Eyeliner along your upper lash line. For optimal magnetic connection, make sure your Magnetic Eyeliner is as thick as the width of the magnets and there are no visible gaps..-Wait 30 seconds allowing your Magnetic Eyeliner to dry almost completely..-Using your fingers, gently place your Glamnetic Magnetic Lashes (sold separately) on to your Magnetic Eyeliner allowing the magnets to connect and gently tug to ensure the grip is secure. .-Adjust lash placement as-needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really disappointing, the old glamnetic pen before the pink box version was much better as is the clear version of this liner. I’ve tried to bake this work 5 times without much success. This was sticky but not to the magnets on the lashes which fell off quickly even after trying muliple coats.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this in exchange for my honest review. The brush is nice and slim. Easy to apply and make very fine precise lines. The formula is great. It glides on effortless with ease. The lashes had no issues sticking! I was able to wear the lashes with magnetic liner for several hours with no issues. It was a little difficult washing off but wouldn't be any issue if you have magnetic lash remover. This version is probably my favorite out of all of the magnetic liners

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This liner glides on so perfectly. I love how dark the black is. Although its a magnetic liner I use it as a regular liner too because it gives me that perfect thin black line I always try to get.

I really liked the Liquid Magnetic Liner! The applicator was super user-friendly and it not only provides a really pigmented color, but also delivers a powerful grip. The liner held the lashes on all day, even through the rain and wind of my walking commute. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This liner is jet black and stays on my eyes without any smearing. Application is quick and easy. The magnetic lashes stay put all day, without any corners lifting off. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying magnetic lashes and I was impressed how well it worked with this magnetic liquid liner. The liner itself is a black liquid eyeliner and is very easy to apply. You can make it very precise and thin if you want. If using with magnetic lashes, i made it thick enough to match the width of the magnets on the lashes. It holds up the lashes for a long time. The packaging is very nice too. Overall, a win for me.
